thread.title: Facebook test drives new video-centric features
thread.title_full: Facebook test drives new video-centric features - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Facebook test drives new video-centric features
text: Facebook has become much more than just a social network; indeed, networking is fairly low down on the list of priorities for many users. The site is increasingly used for gaming, news gathering, and video consumption. Today Facebook announces a batch of new video features in recognition of the fact that videos are what people are looking for. A small-scale test with iPhone users to try out a video suggestion feature is set to extend worldwide, ultimately spreading to the web and Android. Facebook is also borrowing some ideas from the likes of YouTube, including the ability to build up video… [Continue Reading] »
